ygData.subject: Re: Lesser Fay
ygData.msgSnippet: his name is Gearheart who is the quest not Cognoggin and around 30th you can pull him out of Fairy area and live I did it sadly I turned it into Manik and it
ygData.messageBody:
his name is Gearheart who is the quest not Cognoggin and around 30th you can
pull him out of Fairy area and live I did it sadly I turned it into Manik and it
is supposed to go to the gnome warrior chick

D. F. wrote:

> From: "D. F." <led_orc@...>
>
> Has anyone ever heard of a gnome clockwork NPC called Cognoggin? I was
> leaving Steamfont and he was sitting right by the zone border in Lesser Fay.
> He conned blue to me at 18, and since he didn't respond to my hails, I
> promptly killed him. I was afraid that he would drop my faction with people
> in Ak'anon, but it dropped with fairies instead. All he had for loot was a
> rusty short sword. I have never heard of him nor seen him before today, has
> anyone else?
>
> Also, has there always been a gnome observitory in Lesser Fay? I don't ever
> remember seeing it there.
>
> Xisten
>
>
